oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Mistake in Hirsch's proof of the Brouwer fixed point theorem
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: JOSHI, KD
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A mistake in Hirsch's proof of the Brouwer Fixed Point Theorem, based on the Simplicial Approximation Theorem, is pointed out along with some elaboration of its nature and possible ways to salvage Hirsch's proof.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: PROCEEDINGS OF THE AMERICAN MATHEMATICAL SOCIETY, 128(5), 1523-1525
